20110125153152.000|20110125153155.000|CC1|BEING HIT BY A SURPRISE WAVE.

20110125153158.000|20110125153159.000|CC1|>> Reporter: KNOWN AROUND THE

20110125153205.000|20110125153206.000|CC1|RELATIVELY CALM OVER THE

20110125153207.000|20110125153208.000|CC1|MORE THAN A DOZEN SURFERS WERE  
20110125153208.000|20110125153210.000|CC1|RIDING WAVES OF 12 TO 18 FEET.

20110125153213.000|20110125153215.000|CC1|WATER UP TO 30 FEET.            
20110125153215.000|20110125153217.000|CC1|>> THIS WAVE JUST CAME BARRELING
